RelatedSentence: , May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire / -- Quarton Partners is pleased to announce that Freestone Partners has sold Service Refrigeration Company ( SRC ) to Source Refrigeration & HVAC , Inc .
, May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire / -- Quarton Partners is pleased to announce that Freestone Partners has sold Service Refrigeration Company ( SRC ) to Source Refrigeration & HVAC , Inc .
Quarton Partners acted as the exclusive financial advisor to SRC in this transaction .

SRC specializes in providing engineering and design , installation , maintenance and repair services on a wide range of refrigeration equipment , including walk - in coolers / freezers , display cases , ice machines , freezers and coolers .

SRC specializes in providing engineering and design , installation , maintenance and repair services on a wide range of refrigeration equipment , including walk - in coolers / freezers , display cases , ice machines , freezers and coolers .
SRC provides services to supermarkets , convenience stores , food processors and industrial companies .
Freestone principally targets companies in manufacturing , distribution , and commercial and industrial services .
